UPES DEHRADUN 
Assignment-4, 23 OCT 2025 
 
Semester                : III 
Course Name        : Material Science                                                               
Course Code         : MEMA2005                                                                             Max. Marks: 50 
 
Topic: Polymers 
Total Marks: 50 
Instructions: 
• Answer all questions from Sections A and B, and any Three questions from Section 
C. 
• Use neat sketches, labelled diagrams, and correct units wherever necessary. 
• Support your answers with appropriate equations and examples. 
• Clarity, accuracy, and presentation will be given weightage. 
 
Section A – Descriptive Questions (5 × 06 = 30 Marks) 
(Answer any three in about 200–300 words each) 
1. Explain the injection molding process with a neat labeled diagram. Discuss its key 
stages and the primary process parameters affecting product quality. 
(06 Marks) 
2. Describe the compression molding process. Highlight its working principle, 
advantages, and typical applications in thermosetting materials. 
(06 Marks) 
3. Explain the extrusion process used in polymer processing. Discuss the types of 
extruders and products obtained through this technique. 
(06 Marks) 
4. Compare blow molding, rotational molding, and thermoforming in terms of 
process, product geometry, and industrial usage. 
(06 Marks) 
5. Discuss the selection criteria for choosing an appropriate polymer processing 
technique based on: 
o Polymer type (thermoplastic or thermoset) 
o Product geometry (solid, hollow, sheet, film) 
o Production volume 
(06 Marks) 
 
Section B – Application and Analytical Questions (2 × 10 = 20 Marks) 
(Answer any two in detail with sketches wherever possible) 
1. Case Study: 
A manufacturer wants to produce lightweight, hollow containers for food packaging.

o Suggest the most suitable polymer processing technique and justify your 
choice. 
o Explain the process steps and key control parameters. 
(10 Marks) 
2. Compare and Analyze: 
Compare injection molding and compression molding in terms of: 
o Working principle 
o Mold design 
o Type of polymers used 
o Cycle time, cost, and product examples 
(10 Marks) 
3. Design Problem: 
You are tasked with fabricating an automotive bumper using a thermoplastic 
polymer. 
o Select a suitable polymer material and justify your choice. 
o Describe the processing method, temperature and pressure range, and 
post-processing operations (such as trimming, surface finishing, and 
joining). 
(10 Marks) 
 
• Submit your handwritten or typed assignment in PDF format. 
• Include your Name, Roll Number, and Section on every page. 
• Deadline for submission: 13 NOVEMBER 2025. 
• Late submission will attract a penalty of 10% of the total marks.
